title: Where IS Everyone In The ‘Avengers 4’ Trailer? WikiStinks 12.10.18
itunes:title: Where IS Everyone In The ‘Avengers 4’ Trailer? WikiStinks 12.10.18
description:
In episode 290, Jack and Miles are joined by Stuff Mom Never Told You's host Anney Reese to discuss the new Avengers trailer, how Chipotle is ruining fast food, Ecuador trying to break up with Julian Assange, more on Trump's White House behavior as Mueller get's ready to turn in his reports, John Kelly's resignation, that a fake Facebook account that helped create the migrant caravan, Grammy award nominations, Kevin Hart stepping down from Oscar hosting duties, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

1. The Final Stand Against Thanos Begins in the First Trailer for Avengers 4

2. Despite value deals, fast-food prices are on the rise

3. It's Not You, Julian Assange, It's ... Okay, Yeah, IT'S YOU.

4. Rex Tillerson on Trump: ‘Undisciplined, doesn’t like to read’ and tries to do illegal things

5. Two Big Mueller Filings Are Coming. Donald Trump Is Freaking Out.

6. Power Up: Rudy Giuliani talks -- and two lawyers listen

7. The White House Has No Plan for Confronting the Mueller Report

8. Kelly expected to resign soon, no longer on speaking terms with Trump

9. A Mysterious Imposter Account Was Used On Facebook To Drum Up Support For The Migrant Caravan

10. Why Taylor Swift’s 2017 album Reputation got a 2019 Grammy nod

11. Kevin Hart Steps Down as Oscar Host

12. Kevin Hart Is Deleting Old Anti-Gay Tweets After Being Announced As Oscars Host

13. Kevin Hart Instagram "apology"

14. WATCH: Jorja Smith - On Your Own

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
